paper_abstract: A dynamic model is proposed for a tangent cushioning packaging system based on critical components. Conditions for resonance are obtained by applying He's variational iteration method, which should be avoided in the cushioning packaging design. The results help us to understand the dropping damage mechanism of packaged products based on critical components. (C) 2011 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: A mathematical modelling of inner-resonance of tangent nonlinear cushioning packaging system with critical components
